member.name: T:Plot3D.FunctionCompiler
member.summary: Compiles functions as runtime. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Plot3D.FunctionCompiler.Compile(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Compiles function at runtime.
member.param: Number of input parameters.
Function body.
member.exception: Thrown when function was not compiled because of some errors in functions body.

member.name: T:Plot3D.FunctionNotCompiledException
member.summary: The exception is thrown when function was not compiled.

member.name: M:Plot3D.FunctionNotCompiledException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Plot3D.FunctionNotCompiledException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: A message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Plot3D.FunctionNotCompiledException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.name: M:Plot3D.FunctionNotCompiledException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The contextual information about the source or destination.
The object that holds the serialized object data.

member.name: T:Plot3D.CompiledFunction
member.summary: Represents a function that was compiled at runtime.
member.param: Function input parameter.
